column1: Everard Proudfoot is a Hobbits invented for The Lord of the Rings (film series). He is played by Noel Appleby.
Mr. Proudfoot was a grumpy old gaffer
column2: who minded his own business and tending his garden. However
column3: he enjoyed Gandalfs fireworks and only expressed his disapproval when his wife arrived. He was present at Bilbos Farewell Party. He later met the Travellers as they returned home from their journey.
